name: EX Shooting Bottle Break
description:
EX Shooting Bottle Break is about shooting bottles. Shoot many bottles as you can in the time limit. Unlimited shooting fun with bottle aim. Play as an expert shooter& you will become a real bottle sniper shooter.
Features:
- Realistic bottles
- Realistic sound of broken glass
- Realistic Physics
- Easy to control
- 3D graphics with realistic bottles.
- Get ready for intense challenges.
- Realistic sound of broken glass.
